name: Cecilia jimenez
title: Budtender
coverLetter: my name is Cecilia Jimenez. I think I would be perfect for the bud tender position because I love helping people out I love informing our clients about strains there is. About the oils , and the wax showing them the Cbd products also the one that contain Thc. I just think it’s a whole new opportunity for me I’ve never felt more comfortable than when I am working as a bud tender.
experience: I’ve worked in about three shops. One for 3 months and the other for 6 months.
